Headline: #54 Cicero Temporary Reroute at Cicero/Adams
ShortDescription: 54 Cicero buses are temp. rerouted via Cicero, Madison, Kostner, Jackson, then resume their normal route on Cicero, due to police activity near Cicero/Adams.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Cicero, Madison, Kostner, Jackson, then resume their normal route on Cicero, due to police activity near Cicero/Adams.

Allow extra travel time.
